price: 30. Agar Allah menyempurnakan pahalanya kepada mereka dan menambah karunia-Nya. Sungguh, Allah Maha Pengampun, Maha Mensyukuri.*(714)
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
footnotes: *714). Allah mensyukuri hamba-Nya, memberi pahala terhadap amal-amal hamba-Nya, memaafkan kesalahannya, menambah nikmat-Nya dan sebagainya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
